data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Mechelen with the kick-off.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Kostas Laifis is on target to give Liege a 1-0 advantage.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Liege kick-off.
The away team have replaced Siemen Voet with Thibault Peyre. This is the first substitution made today by Wouter Vrancken.
In the minute 58, Mechelen make their second substitution with William Togui replacing Nikola Storm.
Mechelen have been awarded a penalty in Liege...
Goal! The away team are now level through a Joachim Van Damme penalty.
In the minute 67, Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez is on a sub for Maxime Lestienne for Liege.
Felipe Avenatti is replacing Abdoul Tapsoba for the home team.
Collins Fai (Liege) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
In the minute 78, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Michel Ange Balikwisha.
Wouter Vrancken is making the team's third substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Onur Kaya replacing Aster Vranckx.
Sandy Walsh is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Liege's Noe Dussenne has been booked in Liege.
